law.catch_line: Partnership bound by partner's breach of trust.
law.text:
The partnership is bound to make good the loss:
Where one partner acting within the scope of his apparent authority receives money or property of a third person and misapplies it; and
Where the partnership in the course of its business receives money or property of a third person and the money or property so received is misapplied by any partner while it is in the custody of the partnership.
law.history: Repeal the prior repeal contained in 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 239, which was to have been effective January 1, 2008, 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 180, effective June 26, 2007. -- Repealed 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 239, effective January 1, 2008. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 38, sec. 14, effective June 17, 1954.
